settings.title:
It began with a proverbial
light bulb moment
settings.text:
By now, everyone knows pure water and
clean air are healthy must-haves. But while
at home one day, a light bulb went off in
John Goscha’s head. That’s when he realized
something vital was missing from
the equation. NATURAL LIGHT.
settings.caption:
JOHN GOSCHA

Founder

settings.title:
WE NEED NATURAL
LIGHT TO THRIVE
settings.text:
Sunlight energy enters our eyes and follows
ancient pathways in our brain to govern
everything from our circadian sleep-wake
cycle to our heart rate and body temperature
to our metabolism and appetite.

At sunrise, bright, cool daylight releases
cortisol to keep us awake and alert.
With sunset, the warm evening glow
promotes melatonin production to help us
relax, unwind and prepare for restful sleep.
Maintaining the regularity of this schedule
is vital to our health and happiness.

But these days, we spend as much as 90%
of our days indoors - under poor quality light.
We're missing all of the good stuff natural
sunlight does for our bodies, minds, and
moods. And so Brilli was invented. And not
since the sun has light felt so right.

settings.title:
SO YOU CAN FEEL
GREAT INSIDE
settings.text:
More than light a room, Brilli scientists
created a full spectrum of well-being
benefits. To turn on energy, alertness
and focus, and turn on relaxation and better
moods. Just like nature intended. So you
can feel your Brilli best, every day. Get to
know the science behind our light.
settings.caption:
“Lights should do more than
illuminate our surroundings.”
- John Goscha

settings.title: One good turn deserves another.

settings.title: Make the Switch to Wellness Lighting

You have been added to our newsletter.

settings.subtitle: Discover the widest spectrum of well-being benefits.

settings.title:
Changing the world,
ONE LIGHT AT A TIME
settings.text: Through our partnership with Watts of Love, every Brilli purchase brings light to a community that lacks access to resources like electricity, education and economic independence. Because we believe that light is vital to life, and that light should shine equally on all.

settings.title: How is Brilli lighting different from regular LED’s?
settings.text: Our scientific approach to lighting starts with health benefits. We first consider how the light will impact circadian rhythms, the stimulus to mind and mood, neuroaesthetics and visual comfort, and the potential for eyestrain and headaches cause by bad lighting design. We then factor in 7 key color quality metrics, and include premium features like multiple LED’s, premium phosphors and synchronized tuning. Additionally, all Brilli lighting is Energy Star Certified for energy efficiency—because the light should be beautiful and also good for the planet.

settings.title: What makes Brilli lighting better for sleep?
settings.text: Certain wavelengths of light suppress Melatonin in humans, with the strongest response occurring in the short-wavelength portion of the blue spectrum between 446 and 477 nm. This light is good by day, as it promotes energy, focus and alertness. However, there is consensus in the healthcare community that exposure to cool blue light should be minimized beginning 2 hours before bedtime, at a percentage of less than 2%, as anything higher inhibits Melatonin production.

settings.title: What makes Brilli lighting good for circadian rhythms?
settings.text: All Brilli lighting is designed with the optimal Circadian Stimulus (C/S) depending on time of day. And all Brilli lighting is designed with the optimal Melanopic/Photopic (M/P) ratio depending on time of day.

settings.title: How does Brilli mimic sunlight?
settings.text: It would take a thousand super computers to replicate the amazing light spectrum of sunlight. However, Brilli does mimic some of the healthy parts of the sun’s spectrum—the ones that help to align our biological rhythms, improve sleep, boost energy, etc. And we think you should still get sunlight. Sunlight is healthy and we need it for things like Vitamin D. And the simple act of going outside just makes you a happier person.

settings.title: Does Brilli contain “bad” blue light?
settings.text: Blue light at night can be very disruptive to sleep because they suppress melatonin production. That's why we removed these wavelengths from our Wind Down bulbs and Get in Sync fixtures (when dimmed to the low setting.) Even the sun emits blue light wavelengths during the day, which is beneficial to energy, alertness and feeling awake. So, we don’t recommend blocking blue light. Instead, we recommend exposure to blue light for specific times of day.

settings.subtitle: We design around 4 major criteria, ensuring the greatest positive impact to your health and well-being:

settings.title:
Lighting reinvented
for health & wellness
settings.text: Brilli is the first company to focus on improving health, wellness, cleanliness, mood, energy, and sleep through light.

settings.title: <small>Thoughtfully Developed &</small>backed by science
settings.text: When you turn on a Brilli light, you’re turning on the science of more than 650 peer-reviewed studies on light and its effect on human health and well-being.

settings.title:
Live better
with Brilli
settings.text:
Brilli lights are thoughtfully designed to help you live life to its fullest
– morning, noon and night.

settings.title: LIGHTING FOR WELLNESS
settings.text: Make the switch to the energy-efficient lighting scientifically engineered for better health and wellness.

settings.subtitle:
Light does a “You‑turn”
for the better
settings.text:
When designing our light, we had one thing in mind: you.

Our approach to research and development is unlike other lighting companies. We focused on developing a light that would do more than just brighten a room-we wanted to invent a new type of lighting that also improved health and wellness, and was backed by scientific research.

Our patent-pending WellBright Spectrum™ is unique because it provides the most comprehensive balance of wellness, visual comfort, aesthetics, and energy efficiency. We call it the “Brilli Blend”, and there is nothing like it available on the market.

settings.name: Dr. Shadab Rahman

Consulting Circadian Scientist

Advises on circadian neurophysiology, and how lighting characteristics affect circadian rhythms.

settings.heading: We design for eight wellness & efficiency metrics:

settings.text: Multiple LEDs
Premium Phosphors
Dual Tunability

settings.heading: And three premium features:
settings.subheading: Beyond our proprietary light spectrum, Brilli technology is different from traditional LED lighting in three ways:

settings.subtitle: Multiple LEDs
settings.text:
Designed with multiple types of LEDs to simulate the effects of sunrise and sunset, our lights provide the right spectrum of light to improve well-being:
• The dimmable Charge Up collection features powerful bright light, optimized for use in the morning and daytime when you need an energy boost.
• The dimmable Wind Down collection features a soothing light, optimized for use in the late-afternoon and evening, when you want to relax and prepare for sleep.
• The dimmable Get in Sync collection features an adjustable spectrum you can change throughout the day, to get benefits of both Charge Up and Wind Down in a single fixture.

settings.subtitle: Premium Phosphors
settings.text: Most LEDs use inexpensive phosphors to reduce costs, decreasing the quality of the light and increasing annoying flicker. By contrast, Brilli LEDs use premium phosphors to deliver the most robust, high-quality light spectrum and color, while also eliminating flicker that can cause headaches and eye strain.
settings.text1: Brilli has the only fixtures available on the market featuring patent-pending technology that allows you to simultaneously adjust brightness and light spectrum using any standard dimmer.

settings.title:
Live BETTER

settings.text:
Brilli lights are thoughtfully designed to help you live life to its fullest

settings.title:
Light for better health and wellness
OUR STORY

settings.subtitle:
The Beginning
A LIGHT BULB MOMENT
settings.text:
Founder John Goscha began the Brilli journey with a single question: why shouldn't the light in our homes make us feel better?

Enter Brilli: the first lighting company to design home lighting fixtures for holistic health and well-being. We don’t just exist to light up spaces. We light up the people in them, too. Because like clean air and water, we understand that good light is vital to life.

settings.subtitle:
The Continued Journey:
SCIENCE & INNOVATION
settings.text: When you turn on a Brilli light, you’re turning on the science of more than 650 peer-reviewed studies on light and its effects on human health and well-being, and benefitting from the expertise of leading neuroscientists, health scientists, circadian experts, and lighting experts.

settings.subtitle:
The Brilli Promise
MORE THAN JUST LIGHTING
settings.text: Whether you're interested in Bright Clean — our antimicrobial line — or any of our circadian lines, Brilli lighting is the right light for right now. We do more than just illuminate a room.

settings.rich_text:
Most people today spend up to 90% of their time indoors, under harsh LED lighting. But what many don’t realize, is that the eyes do more than just see. Receptors in the retinas ingest light from our surroundings, and this light cues the circadian clock that controls vital biological and psychological functions: everything from sleep-wake cycles to mood to hormone regulation, and more.

This is why Brilli is focused on improving health, wellness, and sleep through something we’re all surrounded with every day of our lives: LIGHT. Our bulbs and fixtures are scientifically designed with visible and non-visible light spectrums that keep your circadian rhythms in balance, and provide the widest range of benefits to health and well-being, so you can feel your Brilli best—at the flip of a switch.
settings.title: <small>1. Circadian Balance</small>
settings.rich_text1: Circadian rhythm is the 24-hour internal clock that runs in the background of our brain. This clock controls sleep-wake cycle, hormone production, mood and metabolism, cell regeneration and more. Cued by light at sunrise and sunset, this rhythm tells us when to wake in the morning or relax in the evening. With the Brilli WellBright Spectrum™, you can get the right light at the right time of day, to keep your circadian rhythms in-balance, even when you can’t get exposure to natural sunlight.

settings.title: 4. Prepare for Sleep
settings.rich_text1: Skip the sleep supplements. Significantly reduced blue light in the Brilli WellBright Spectrum™ (2700K and below) helps prevent disruption in melatonin production and alertness caused by blue-light exposure before bedtime. Along with rich, warm, calming colors, our light spectrum creates the ideal lighting environment to help the body unwind and get ready for sleep.

settings.title: 8. Minimize eyestrain
settings.rich_text1: We beat the daylights out of the competition when it comes to visual comfort: all Brilli lighting minimizes flicker caused by dimmers. Flicker is known to cause eye discomfort, eyestrain and headaches.

settings.sub_text: of users who tried Wind Down lights reported an improved mood
of users who tried Wind Down lights reported falling asleep faster
of users who tried Charge Up lights reported feeling more alert
of users who tried Charge Up lights reported feeling more energized

settings.subtitle: 2. Improve Mood
settings.text: Specific wavelengths of blue light, as well as the beauty of our surroundings, can trigger positive changes in the brain that affect emotional responses and improve mood. The Brilli WellBright Spectrum™ delivers the highest light quality of color fidelity, vibrancy, brightness, and balance of blue light— providing mood-improving benefits that you can feel.
settings.text1: Turn on the “zen”. At 2700K and below, the WellBright Spectrum™ reduces stimulating blue light and provides an optimal color balance for a relaxing and soothing environment.

settings.subtitle: 5. Feel More Focused
settings.text: We make “working from home” work for you. At 5000K, the Brilli WellBright Spectrum™ provides bright, blue-enriched light to promote improved mental clarity and focus.
settings.text1: Forget about the afternoon slump. At 5000K, the Brilli WellBright Spectrum™ provides the right type of blue light to help support increased activity, tasking, and productivity—naturally.
settings.text2: See—and think—more clearly. At 5000K, the Brilli WellBright Spectrum™ provides the right type of blue light to help improve mental clarity, so you feel more alert.

settings.title: About Brilli
settings.question1: What are the benefits of Brilli lighting?
settings.answer1: Most indoor lighting has one benefit, such as energy efficiency or light quality. In contrast, Brilli’s circadian lighting with patent-pending WellBright Spectrum™, has wellness benefits to help get your sleep-wake cycle in sync, reduce stress,minimize eyestrain, boost your mood, and increase alertness and energy — all without sacrificing light quality or energy efficiency; and Brilli’s antimicrobial lighting has the power to clean and keep your space fresh, while also shining with high-quality LED light.
settings.question2: How long does it take to experience the benefits of Brilli circadian lighting?
settings.answer2: Think of Brilli’s circadian wellness lighting like a vitamin that supplements your sun exposure. Some benefits can be felt in just 20 minutes, like increased energy, focus, and relaxation. To balance your circadian rhythm, you'll need to use the light for a few weeks at the correct time of day to sync your sleep-wake cycles.
settings.question3: How long does it take to experience the benefits of Brilli antimicrobial lighting?
settings.answer3: Bright Clean can kill* or reduce viruses, bacteria, fungi, mold, mildew in as little as 6 hours and as much as 24 hours. Different microorganisms are impacted by Bright Clean’s 405 nanometer LEDs at different rates.
settings.answer4: Brilli was founded by inventor John Goscha who set out to create a holistic approach to wellness lighting. He recognized that lighting companies had largely ignored the negative impacts of artificial light on healthy living and visual comfort.
settings.answer5: Brilli’s headquarters are in Boston, Massachusetts, a city known as a hub of innovation, science, and technology.
settings.answer6: We spend up to 90% of our time indoors, and much of this time is spent under artificial light. But what if our lighting could be used to do more; what if it could be used to improve health and wellness? This idea led Brillifounder John Goscha his team of experts in neuroscience and circadian health to invest in wellness lighting research and design, and to leverage the findings of more than 650 studies on the impact of light on human health and well-being.
settings.question7: Where can I buy Brilli Wellness Lighting?
settings.answer7:
Brilli Wellness Lighting products are available online from the following retailers:

For Sales inquiries, please contact concierge@bebrilli.com
settings.question8: How can I get in contact with Brilli?
settings.answer8: We’d love to hear from you! Send us an email at concierge@bebrilli.com or give us a call at 305-558-4777

settings.title: Brilli Antimicrobial
settings.question1: How are Bright Clean lights different from UV wands and other UV-cleaning items?
settings.answer1: Unlike UV light which is dangerous to humans, Brilli Bright Clean is approved for continuous and unlimited use around people, plants, and pets. Bright Clean fixtures shine at a wavelength of 405 nm, initiating a photo-reaction in microbes that kills* viruses, bacteria, mold, yeasts, and fungi.
settings.answer2: BrilliBright Clean technology doesn't use ultraviolet (UV) light; so you can use it continuously around your family without worry.
settings.answer3: We partnered with Vyv, a market leader in antimicrobial LEDs, to create our Bright Clean line. Vyv’s patented antimicrobial technology produces light that shines at a wavelength of 405 nm, initiating a photo-reaction in microbes that kills* viruses, bacteria, mold, yeasts, and fungi.
settings.question4: Do I need a remote or special software to operate Bright Clean fixtures?
settings.answer4: No,Bright Clean is incredibly easy to use. All you need is a standard light switch.Flip twice to turn on the cleaning power of Brilli Bright Clean, once to turn on the standard lighting mode. All Bright Clean fixtures are also compatible with any standard dimmer.
settings.question5: Does Bright Clean replace manual methods of cleaning?
settings.answer5: Bright Clean lights are not intended to replace manual cleaning, but they do help extend the benefits of manual cleaning, and are a more sustainable,chemical-free way to keep your space clean.
settings.question6:
Do I need a remote to
operate Bright Clean hardwired fixtures?
settings.answer6:
No, Bright Clean fixtures are incredibly easy to use. You can conveniently toggle between the two lighting modes using your wall light switch. To turn the bright white light mode on, toggle your light switch <ON> from the <OFF> position. To activate the antimicrobial mode, with the fixture <ON> toggle <OFF> then <ON> again quickly. Turning <OFF> and <ON> again will change the fixture back to the standard white lighting mode. 

All Bright Clean fixtures, including the 24” LED Vanity Bar and 5/6” Recessed Shower Fixture, are also compatible with any standard dimmer. View a full list of
compatible dimmers here.
settings.question7:
Do I need a remote to
operate Bright Clean light bulbs?
settings.answer7:
No, Bright Clean bulbs can be
conveniently controlled via your phone using the Brilli mobile app, available for free download from the Google Play app store, and Apple app store. Use the Brilli mobile app to create customized cleaning and lighting schedules, adjust brightness of the bulb(s) in Standard White Lighting mode, group multiple fixtures containing Bright Clean light bulbs together, and more.

The smart technology that
controls how Bright Clean light bulbs work, is contained inside the light bulb and controlled via the app, eliminating the need for a separate hub. Like most smart-home devices, Bright Clean should be connected to your home’s Wi-Fi network at the 2.4 GHz frequency. Modern routers are generally “dual-band”, and can simultaneously operate separate Wi-Fi networks on the 5 GHz and 2.4 GHz frequencies without issue.

If you would prefer to use a
smart wall switch with Bright Clean light bulbs, we recommend the smart wall
switch by Feit.

settings.title: Brilli Circadian
settings.answer1: Brilli’s WellBright Spectrum™ is our patent-pending blend of lighting wellness benefits, light quality, and energy efficiency.
settings.answer2: No artificial light can replace sunlight. Sunlight is healthy and we need it for things like Vitamin D. And the simple act of going outside just makes you a happier person. Think of Brilli more like a vitamin that supplements your sunlight exposure.
settings.answer3: Circadian rhythm or cycle is the 24-hour internal clock that runs in the background of our brains. Cued by sunrise and sunset, it tells us when to “wake up in the morning” or “relax at night.” It also helps regulate things like hormones.
settings.answer4: “CS”was developed by the Lighting Research Center at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute as a metric to indicate how well one hour of exposure to a lightsource producing a certain level and wavelength of light stimulates the circadian system, based on its ability to suppress the hormone Melatonin.Exposure to a 0.3+ C/S is effective for Melatonin Suppression, which is ideal for day time use. Brilli’s Charge Up light collection is developed for optimum circadian stimulus and perfect for daytime use.
settings.answer5: Serotonin is an important chemical and neurotransmitter in the body. It is believed to help regulate mood and social behavior, appetite and digestion, sleep, memory,and sexual desire and function. As the precursor for melatonin, it helps regulate the body's sleep-wake cycles and the internal clock.
settings.question6: Why is the blue light in Brilli Charge Up light bulbs considered good?
settings.answer6: We tuned our spectrum to specific blue light wavelengths in order to achieve the right benefits for day time -- like energy, focus and alertness.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.disclaimer: *Testing on a non-enveloped virus (MS2 bacteriophage) showed a 99.985% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 6 hours on hard surfaces. MRSA and E. coli showed 90%+ reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 24 hours on hard surfaces. Results may vary depending on the amount of light that is reaching the surfaces in the space where the product is installed and the length of time of exposure. Use of Bright Clean antimicrobial light is not intended to replace manual cleaning.

settings.title:
Our Founding Principle
A COMMITMENT TO SCIENCE
settings.description: Since the beginning, we have been feuled by a spirit of innovation. Whether in working with neuroscientists to develop our circadian technology or in our partnership with the field's foremost antimicrobial LED experts, we're committed to making sure that our benefits are based in science and rigorously tested.

settings.title:
Where Science Meets Wellness
CIRCADIAN INNOVATION
settings.description: Our approach to research and development is unlike other lighting companies. We developed circadian lighting technology that does more than just brighten a room — it makes people feel better, too.

settings.title:
A New Way to Clean
Innovative Antimicrobial Science

settings.subtitle: <center>ANTIMICROBIAL INNOVATION</center>
settings.text: Introducing Bright Clean: our antimicrobial line powered by Vyv™ technology. Discover the science behind the powerful LED technology that kills* viruses, bacteria, mold, fungi, and more with LED light.
settings.list1: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.list3: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.subtitle: MULTIPLE LEDS:
settings.text: Designed with multiple types of LEDs to simulate the effects of sunrise and sunset, our lights provide the right spectrum of light to improve well-being:
settings.list1: Charge Up features powerful bright light, optimized for use in the morning and daytime when you need an energy boost
settings.list2: Wind Down features a soothing light, optimized for use in the late-afternoon and evening, when you want to relax and prepare for sleep
settings.list3: Get in Sync features an adjustable spectrum you can change throughout the day, to get the wellness benefits of both Charge Up and Wind Down in a single fixture

settings.subtitle: HOW IT WORKS:
settings.text:
We partnered with Vyv, the market leader in antimicrobial LEDs, to create our Bright Clean line. Vyv's patented antimicrobial technology produces light that shines at a wavelength of 405 nm, initiating a photo-reaction in microbes that kills* viruses, bacteria, mold, yeasts, and fungi.

This reaction affects a type of molecule that's only found in microorganisms (not macroorganisms, like us), and ultimately results in the death of the organism from the inside out. However, this wavelength of light doesn't degrade DNA or RNA in humans, and meets IEC (International Electrotechnical Commission) standards for continuous use around people, pets and plants.

settings.subtitle: CIRCADIAN INNOVATION
settings.text: Discover the science behind our Wind Down, Charge Up, Get in Sync, and Look Up collections. Our patent-pending WellBright Spectrum™ provides the most comprehensive balance of wellness benefits, visual comfort, intentional design, and energy-efficiency possible.

settings.subtitle: PREMIUM PHOSPHORS:
settings.text: Most LEDs use inexpensive phosphors to reduce costs, decreasing the quality of the light and increasing annoying flicker. Brilli LEDs use premium phosphors that deliver the most robust, high-quality light spectrum and color and eliminate flicker that can cause headaches and eye strain.

settings.title: MEET THE EXPERTS
settings.text: When you turn on a Brilli light, you’re turning on the science of more than 650 peer-reviewed studies on light and its effect on human health and well-being.

settings.subtitle: TOTAL TUNABILITY:
settings.text: Brilli circadian fixtures are the only fixtures available on the market to feature patent-pending technology that allows you to simultaneously adjust brightness and light spectrum using any standard dimmer.

settings.title: Gram-Positive Bacteria
settings.description:
Staphylococcus aureus (incl. MRSA)
Staphylococcus epidermidis
Staphylococcus hyicus
Clostridium perfringens
Clostridium difficile

Streptococcus thermophilus

settings.title: Gram-Negative Bacteria
settings.description:
Acinetobacter baumannii (incl. MDRA)

settings.disclaimer: *Testing on a non-enveloped virus (MS2 bacteriophage) showed a 97.12% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 8 hours on hard surfaces. Testing on SARS-CoV-2 (enveloped virus) showed a 98.45% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 4 hours on hard surfaces. Testing on Influenza A (enveloped virus) showed an 84.51% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 8 hours on hard surfaces. Testing on MRSA and E. coli showed 90%+ reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 24 hours on hard surfaces. Results may vary depending on the amount of light that is reaching the surfaces in the space where the product is installed and the length of time of exposure. Use of Vyv antimicrobial light is not intended to replace manual cleaning and disinfection practices.

settings.title: <small>About Vyv</small>
settings.description: Vyv is a new class of clean light technology that harnesses the antimicrobial power within the visible light spectrum. Vyv stops the growth and kills* viruses, bacteria, fungi, yeast, mold and mildew. Unlike UV light, Vyv is fine for us to be exposed to anytime and without any restrictions. Vyv lights are built to continuously reduce microbial growth to keep our indoor environments and surfaces clean.

settings.title_bc: Can I use this light around people?
settings.text_bc:
Yes!
Brilli Bright Clean meets IEC standards for unrestricted and continuous use around people.
settings.text_uv:
No.
UV-C light does not meet IEC standards for unrestricted and continuous use around people.

settings.title_bc: Can I use this light in occupied spaces?
settings.text_bc:
Yes!
You can use Brilli Bright Clean in both occupied and unoccupied spaces.
settings.text_uv:
No.
UV-C light is recommended for use in unoccupied spaces.

settings.title_bc: Does this light affect DNA or RNA?
settings.text_bc:
No.
Brilli Bright clean kills a cell via ROS, which is produced by porphyrin molecules when excited by 405nm light.
settings.text_uv:
Yes.
UV-C light causes the destruction of DNA/RNA: all genetic material.

settings.text_bc:
No.
Brilli Bright Clean does not cause degredation effects to materials.
settings.text_uv:
Yes.
UV-C light causes degredation effections to materials such as plastics and rubber.

settings.subtitle: Vyv™ Antimicrobial Light does not use UV-C light, which has the potential to damage human DNA.

settings.heading:
Experience the benefits
OF BRIGHT CLEAN
settings.subheading: <sup>†</sup>Testing on a non-enveloped virus (MS2 bacteriophage) showed a 99.985% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 6 hours on hard surfaces. MRSA and E. coli showed 90%+ reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 24 hours on hard surfaces. Results may vary depending on the amount of light that is reaching the surfaces in the space where the product is installed and the length of time of exposure. Use of Vyv antimicrobial light is not intended to replace manual cleaning.

settings.title: INSTALLATION & USE
settings.text: The Bright Clean 5/6" Recessed LED is a retrofit recessed integrated LED fixture, so installation is as easy as connecting the socket adapter and fitting the fixture into your existing standard 5-inch or 6-inch recessed lighting can. For best results, we recommend that target surfaces be within nine feet of the installed light fixture.

settings.title: CHARGE UP BULB
settings.text: Scientifically designed to boost focus and energy levels. So go ahead and enjoy — your day is about to get a whole lot easier.

settings.title: WIND DOWN BULB
settings.text: Scientifically designed to help reduce stress and prepare for restful sleep. So go ahead and enjoy — relaxation is about to get a whole lot easier.

settings.title: LIGHTING REINVENTED
settings.text: Our Charge Up bulbs are crafted with high-quality flicker-resistant LEDs and optimal circadian stimulus levels to help you feel more energized and alert. Charge Up is bright and refreshing, and shines with more than 3% blue light to help you feel ready to take on the day.

settings.text:

anywhere else you'd like a little boost.

settings.title: Prioritize Wellness
settings.text: Aligning your circadian rhythm helps your body fall into natural rhythms that will help you feel better and more energized throughout the day.

settings.title: Enjoy a Moment for Yourself
settings.text: A Wind Down bulb is the perfect way to create a space dedicated to your own relaxation practice — whether that means reading, meditating, journaling, or simply taking the time to decompress after a long day.
settings.text1: Wind Down bulbs are a great option for nurseries or a child's bedroom — the warm, soothing light will help your little ones unwind and get ready to drift off to sleep.

settings.title: EASY TO USE
settings.text: This product comes in two standard lighting modes and can be easily controlled with the flip of a standard lighting switch. Surfaces within 6.6 feet of the fixture will receive the most impact from the violet antimicrobial mode.

settings.title: LABORATORY TESTED
settings.text: Bright Clean’s UV-Free 405 nanometer light attacks virus, bacteria, mold, mildew and fungi organisms from multiple vectors preventing the cell from building up any new defenses against this form of attack. This is unlike approaches used with antibiotics that can cause germs to mutate and develop resistance.

settings.title: LED POWERED CLEANING TECHNOLOGY
settings.text: Powered by patented Vyv® technology, Bright Clean uses LEDs that operate on an antimicrobial wavelength, breaking down the cell membranes and proteins of microorganisms such as viruses, bacteria, mold, fungi and mildew; killing and preventing the regrowth of common germs by damaging them beyond recovery.

settings.title: 2021 SAPPHIRE AWARDS FINALIST
settings.text: The Brilli Bright Clean Antimicrobial 24” LED Vanity Bar was selected as a finalist in the 2021 Sapphire Lighting Awards. Finalists for these awards must create technologies that enhance the human experience and safety in the built environment while breaking away from conventional factors.

settings.heading:
Experience the benefits
OF BRIGHT CLEAN
settings.subheading: <center style="margin-top:30px;padding-left: 30px ;     padding-right: 30px ;">*Testing on a non-enveloped virus (MS2 bacteriophage) showed a 97.12% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 8 hours on hard surfaces. Testing on SARS-CoV-2 (enveloped virus) showed a 98.45% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 4 hours on hard surfaces. Testing on Influenza A (enveloped virus) showed an 84.51% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 8 hours on hard surfaces. Testing on MRSA and E. coli showed 90%+ reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 24 hours on hard surfaces. Results may vary depending on the amount of light that is reaching the surfaces in the space where the product is installed and the length of time of exposure. Use of Vyv antimicrobial light is not intended to replace manual cleaning and disinfection practices.</center>

settings.title: SMART LIGHTING-THAT CLEANS
settings.text:
Cleaning has never been so easy. Download the Brilli app from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store and sit back as your UV-Free bulb kills* and prevents the growth of bacteria, viruses, mold, mildew and more.

Using the app, you can control light modes, dimming and set schedules all from your device.

settings.title: SMART LIGHTING-THAT CLEANS
settings.text:
Cleaning has never been so easy. download the Brilli app from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store and sit back as your UV-Free bulb kills* and prevents the growth of bacteria, viruses, mold, mildew and more.

Using the app, you can control light modes, dimming and set schedules all from your device.
Use Amazon Alexa and "Hey Google” to control Bright Clean lights with your voice.
Using the Smart Scheduler, set Bright Clean lights to automatically clean on your schedule.

Bright Clean bulbs are easy to set up

over 2.4 GHz wifi. No smart hub is required.

settings.title: TWO COLOR MODES-TO FIT YOUR LIFE
settings.text:
Using the dimmer feature in the Brilli mobile app, choose the right shade of white light to illuminate your space. From home office to kitchen, Bright Clean comes in standard and flood bulb sizes; designed compliment your favorite lighting fixtures.

When you are ready to clean, set your light to CLEAN mode and let the proven, purple-hued Antimicrobial light get to work killing* bacteria, viruses, mold, mildew and more. Bright Clean even reduces odor-causing bacteria.

settings.title: TWO COLOR MODES-TO FIT YOUR LIFE
settings.text:
Using the dimmer feature in the Brilli mobile app, choose the right shade of white light to illuminate your space. From home office to kitchen, Bright Clean comes in standard and flood bulb sizes; designed compliment your favorite lighting fixtures.

When you are ready to clean, set your light to CLEAN mode and let the proven, purple-hued Antimicrobial light get to work killing* bacteria, viruses, mold, mildew and more. Bright Clean even reduces odor-causing bacteria.

settings.title:
Laboratory tested &
APPROVED FOR USE AROUND-PEOPLE, PETS & PLANTS
settings.text: Bright Clean does not damage human DNA or household surfaces. Unlike other UV-C lighting, the Brilli Bright Clean bulb is UV-Free and has been approved for continuous use around people, pets and plants.

settings.title:
Laboratory tested &
APPROVED FOR USE AROUND-PEOPLE, PETS & PLANTS
settings.text: Bright Clean does not damage human DNA or household surfaces. Unlike other UV-C lighting, the Brilli Bright Clean bulb is UV-Free and has been approved for continuous use around people, pets and plants.

settings.title: FOR THE BEST CLEAN
settings.text:
For best results, the light from Bright Clean should make direct contact with surfaces, and unobstructed by light shades or diffusers.

To kill, prevent, and reduce the
replication of viruses, bacteria, fungi, yeast, mold, and mildew, the light must be in Violet Antimicrobial Mode. The longer the light is on in Violet Antimicrobial Mode, the more effective it will be in reducing and preventing the replication of these microorganisms.

For continuous cleaning, Bright Clean can be used up to 24 hours a day. Consistently using Bright Clean will contribute to an overall reduction in microbes (results may vary depending on location of light and surrounding objects). This product is not for treating food or liquids.

settings.title: FOR THE BEST CLEAN
settings.text:
For best results, the light from Bright Clean should make direct contact with surfaces, and unobstructed by light shades or diffusers.

To kill, prevent, and reduce the
replication of viruses, bacteria, fungi, yeast, mold, and mildew, the light must be in Violet Antimicrobial Mode. The longer the light is on in Violet Antimicrobial Mode, the more effective it will be in reducing and preventing the replication of these microorganisms.

For continuous cleaning, Bright Clean can be used up to 24 hours a day. Consistently using Bright Clean will contribute to an overall reduction in microbes (results may vary depending on location of light and surrounding objects). This product is not for treating food or liquids.

settings.disclaimer: *Testing on a non-enveloped virus (MS2 bacteriophage) howed a 97.12% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 8 hours on hard surfaces. Testing on SARS-CoV-2 (enveloped virus) showed a 98.45% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 4 hours on hard surfaces. Testing on Influenza A (enveloped virus) showed an 84.51% reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 8 hours on hard surfaces. Testing on MRSA and E. coli showed 90%+ reduction in controlled laboratory testing in 24 hours on hard surfaces. Results may vary depending on the amount of light that is reaching the surfaces in the space where the product is installed and the length of time of exposure. Use of Vyv antimicrobial light is not intended to replace manual cleaning and disinfection practices.
